title: Wise Blood Records Streams Their Killer 2024 Label Sampler
description: Featuring Graveripper, Bloodletter, Suffer, Acid Mass, and more!
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 8 hours ago
excerpt: Featuring Graveripper, Bloodletter, Suffer, Acid Mass, and more!
text: Wise Blood Records is now streaming their 2024 sampler featuring crushing tunes from bands like Graveripper, Bloodletter, Suffer, Grozov, and more! Check it out below and get it right here on Bandcamp – it's sure to introduce you to a buncha great metal bands you haven't heard of before. "Wise Blood celebrates our upcoming 4th anniversary by offering our biggest and heaviest label sampler yet," wrote Wise Blood. "20 tracks from Wise Blood's releases and other underground bands I love. Like always, it's totally FREE to download and share. "Wise Blood's year-end compilations are an ode to the Earplugged sampler series in the '90s, and features the entire spectrum of heavy music. Death Metal. Thrash. Black Metal. Doom. Hardcore. Darkwave. Punk. Heavy Metal. It's all welcome at Wise Blood. Our riffs are mean, but we're not. "While the compilation is free to download, please share your favorite discoveries from the sampler with friends and tag the label and bands you dig most." Want More Metal? html:
Wise Blood Records is now streaming their 2024 sampler featuring crushing tunes from bands like Graveripper, Bloodletter, Suffer, Grozov, and more! Check it out below and get it right here on Bandcamp – it's sure to introduce you to a buncha great metal bands you haven't heard of before.

"Wise Blood celebrates our upcoming 4th anniversary by offering our biggest and heaviest label sampler yet," wrote Wise Blood. "20 tracks from Wise Blood's releases and other underground bands I love. Like always, it's totally FREE to download and share.

"Wise Blood's year-end compilations are an ode to the Earplugged sampler series in the '90s, and features the entire spectrum of heavy music. Death Metal. Thrash. Black Metal. Doom. Hardcore. Darkwave. Punk. Heavy Metal. It's all welcome at Wise Blood. Our riffs are mean, but we're not.

"While the compilation is free to download, please share your favorite discoveries from the sampler with friends and tag the label and bands you dig most."
